price: Adem, Rabbinden emirler aldı, onları yerine getirdi. Bunun üzerine, Rabbi de tevbesini kabul etti. Nitekim O, tevbeleri kabul eden ve çok merhametli olandır.
arabic: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلتَّوَّابُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fatalaqqā ādamu min rabbihi kalimātin fatāba ʿalayhi innahu huwa al-tawābu al-raḥīmu
